titleStmt.title: A most ioyfull songe made in the behalfe of all her Maiesties faithfull and louing subiects of the great ioy which was made in London at the taking of the late trayterous conspirators : to the tune of O man in desperation / [by] T.D.
titleStmt.author: Deloney, Thomas, 1543?-1600.
